path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - NF3X Smartcontracts - v1.2.pdf

findings.title: Seller Can Set Wrong Type in `_reserveInfo.remaining` to Stop Buyer from `payRemains`
findings.description: Seller can set wrong type in `_reserveInfo.remaining` but correct in `_reserveInfo.deposit`, preventing buyer from making `payRemains` and allowing seller to steal the collateral.
